name: getDatabasesPostgreSQLInstanceBackup
description:
Display information for a single backup for an accessible Managed PostgreSQL Database.

The Database must not be provisioning to perform this command.

instanceId.description: The ID of the Managed PostgreSQL Database.

backupId.description: The ID of the Managed PostgreSQL Database backup.

$ul: **created**: A time value given in a combined date and time format that represents when the database backup was created.
**id**: The ID of the database backup object.
**label**: The database backup's label, for display purposes only.
**type**: The type of database backup, determined by how the backup was created.
